attributes.action: Scrap Hinkley Point C in favour of a different nuclear power plant design
attributes.additional_details:
Hinkley Point C has already been delayed. Why not invest in Gen IV plants or build a Gen III Plant, or even switch to modular reactors when commercially viable?

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-34149392

http://www.telegraph.co.uk/finance/newsbysector/energy/11867331/EDF-Power-price-irrelevant-to-Hinkley-Point-nuclear-deal.html

http://www.theguardian.com/environment/2015/sep/18/we-are-pro-nuclear-but-hinkley-c-must-be-scrapped
attributes.background: Hinkley Point C has been proposed by EDF Energy to build a European Pressurised Reactor. This design has had repeated attempts to build, in Finland and France, with both way over budget and off time-scale. Therefore, I ask the government to not waste money subsidising this, and scrap the plans
